original_title: Sri Lanka’s President announces national transformation roadmap
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); President Ranil Wickremesinghe said that nobody will be allowed to drag the country back to the state it was in a year ago.
President Wickremesinghe delivered a special statement on the national transformation roadmap on Thursday (1) evening.
MEPA appoints two PCs to assist AG Department in X-Press Pearl claim
Sri Lanka will be a fully developed country by 2048; economic growth will be based on four pillars – President
